: : SharpClaw : :
He chuckled at the femme, as he turned and moved towards the door, unlocking it.
SharpClaw: Amuseing, but who do you think your threatening? You saw what happend when you tried to attack me a few moments ago.
 raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@...> wrote:KitKat::

She started to growl at him. "Let me out. Or I'll tear your head 
right off your shoulders." She bared her bot teeth. "NOW!"





--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : SharpClaw : :
> He shrugged.
> SharpClaw: If you wish, but I'd prefer to talk? What pain and anger 
do you carry in your spark and why? I was brought up a soldier and 
all I know is war, but I have no personal pain or anger from it.
